description: The notification sent when a signal change occurs

event.Summary: $v1 signal state changed to $v2 on port $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventOccurred OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventType s EXAMPLE OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventState s EXAMPLE OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventPortNumber i 9999 OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventPortLabel s EXAMPLE

description: Serial port number on which this signal applies
variables.name: OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventPortNumber

description: The label for the serial port where the signal applies.
variables.name: OG-SIGNAL-MIB::ogsgnlEventPortLabel
